itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the beauty and elegance of having hot summer sex, fat lead singers of the 90's, the 25th anniversary of the movie "Cool Runnings", and Evan's sweet war dreams where he gets to kill hundreds of people.
